while True:
    a = raw_input().split()
    if a == ['0','0','0']:
        break
    else:
        if int(a[1]) - int(a[0]) == int(a[2])-int(a[1]):
            print "AP", (int(a[2]) + (int(a[1]) - int(a[0])))
        elif int(a[1])/int(a[0]) == int(a[2])/int(a[1]):
            print "GP", (int(a[2]) * (int(a[1]) / int(a[0])))
